name: Ruffle Cowl- Green and White Stripe
description:
Your neck has never loved something so much as a cowl. They wrap around your neck and never fall off, you don't have to worry about the tailends of scarves getting in the way. These are so comfy and soft. Perfect for those chilly days and cold evenings.  Cowls look amazing with your fuzzy wool peacoat or light weight pull-over. The sweet ruffle adds some great sass to any outfit.

This cowl is a funky green and white stripe. Small stripes make it great for an added detail to any outfit!
